# TwinObjectExtensions.UnSubscribeShadowValueChange method

Un-subscribes [`Shadow`](../../Ix.Connector.ValueTypes/OnlinerBase-1/Shadow.md) value change delegate from the value tags of given object.

```csharp
public static void UnSubscribeShadowValueChange(this ITwinObject obj)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| obj | Object from which the shadow value change delegate has to be removed. |
